'''Felicity''' is a bridesmaid of [[Emily Waltham]] portrayed by [[Olivia Williams]]. 

She dates [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] during [[Ross Geller|Ross]]' wedding. After Joey comes back to New York, she is never mentioned again.
